Package edu.washington.cs.ds.jeremyc.paxos

Class Summary
Assembly Just a main method that instantiates one or several assembly members, and starts the servers of those it deems to be local (comprised of Member instances).
BallotNumber The ballot number is comprised of the unique ID of the member initiating the ballot (to gurantee global uniqueness of ballot numbers) and an integer which is incremented as subsequent ballots are issued for the same decree by the same host.
Decree A small sample of something that we might store in a distributed fashion.
Ledger Entries made in indelable ink.
Ledger.LedgerAccessor Sleepycat JE Persistence implementation for accessing Ledger entries by decree number.
Member A member of parliament.
MemberID The ID of a member of the paxos parliament.
Message The general object conveyed in communication.
Paper Names and descriptions taken directly from Appendix A1 of Lamport's "Part-time Parliament", items which are written on a piece of paper.
Paper.PaperAccessor Sleepycat JE Persistence implementation for accessing Paper entries by decree number.
Storage Container of Sleepycat JE entities that must be defined.
TestClient Client to submit new decrees to some specified proposer.
 

Enum Summary
Message.Type A message type enumeration, corresponding to the messages described in Appendix A1 of Lamport's "Part-time Parliament" with the following two exceptions: The NEW message is used to ask a parliament member to initiate a new decree.
Paper.Status
